description: Associates tags with an OpenSearch Serverless resource. For more information, see Tagging Amazon OpenSearch Serverless collections.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. The resource must be active (not in the DELETING state), and must be owned by the account ID included in the request.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of tags (key-value pairs) to add to the resource. All tag keys in the request must be unique. (dict) --- A map of key-value pairs associated to an OpenSearch Serverless resource. The key to use in the tag. The value of the tag.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key to use in the tag.
